metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6914 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Directory traversal vulnerability in the Dir.mktmpdir method in the tmpdirlibrary in Ruby before 2.2.10, 2.3.x before 2.3.7, 2.4.x before 2.4.4,2.5.x before 2.5.1, and 2.6.0-preview1 might allow attackers to createarbitrary directories or files via a .. (dot dot) in the prefix argument.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-6914` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libruby2.5 - 2.5.1-1
ruby2.5 - 2.5.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby2.5 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.1-1').
